vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Ephraim living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.10;
son of: Ammihud (H5989);
father of: Nun (H5126)
§ Elishama = "my God has heard"
1) an Ephraimite chief in the wilderness
2) a son of David
3) Jehoiakim's secretary
4) a priest who taught the law
5) a man of Judah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Amihud; jefe; tribu de Efraín; ancestro de Josué; (b)   hijo de David; tribu de Judá; (c)   abuelo de Ismael; (d)   hijo de Jecamías; tribu de Judá; (e)   sacerdote; en tiempos de Josafat; (f)   funcionario; en tiempos de Joaquim
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以利沙瑪 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我的神已經聽到"
1) 在曠野的時代, 以法蓮支派的一位領袖 (民 2:18)
2) 大衛王的一個兒子 (代上 3:6,8)
3) 約雅敬的書記
4) 教訓百姓律法的一位祭司 (代下 17:8)
5) 一位猶大人 (代上 2:41)
6) 一名王室的後裔 (王下 25:25; 耶 41:1)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以利沙玛 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我的神已经听到"
1) 在旷野的时代, 以法莲支派的一位领袖 (民 2:18)
2) 大卫王的一个儿子 (代上 3:6,8)
3) 约雅敬的书记
4) 教训百姓律法的一位祭司 (代下 17:8)
5) 一位犹大人 (代上 2:41)
6) 一名王室的后裔 (王下 25:25; 耶 41:1)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.5.16;
son of: David (H1732);
brother of: Amnon (H0550), Chileab (H3609), Absalom (H0053), Adonijah (H0138), Shephatiah (H8203), Ithream (H3507), Shammua (H8051H), Shobab (H7727), Nathan (H5416), Solomon (H8010), Ibhar (H2984), Elishua (H0474), Nepheg (H5298H), Japhia (H3309I), Eliada (H0450), Eliphelet (H0467), Tamar (H8559H), Elpelet (H0467I), Nogah (H5052) and Jerimoth (H3406N)
§ Elishama = "my God has heard"
1) an Ephraimite chief in the wilderness
2) a son of David
3) Jehoiakim's secretary
4) a priest who taught the law
5) a man of Judah

A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.25.25;
father of: Nethaniah (H5418)
§ Elishama = "my God has heard"
1) an Ephraimite chief in the wilderness
2) a son of David
3) Jehoiakim's secretary
4) a priest who taught the law
5) a man of Judah

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.41;
son of: Jekamiah (H3359)
§ Elishama = "my God has heard"
1) an Ephraimite chief in the wilderness
2) a son of David
3) Jehoiakim's secretary
4) a priest who taught the law
5) a man of Judah

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.5.15;
son of: David (H1732);
brother of: Amnon (H0550), Chileab (H3609), Absalom (H0053), Adonijah (H0138), Shephatiah (H8203), Ithream (H3507), Shammua (H8051H), Shobab (H7727), Nathan (H5416), Solomon (H8010), Ibhar (H2984), Nepheg (H5298H), Japhia (H3309I), Elishama (H0476H), Eliada (H0450), Eliphelet (H0467), Tamar (H8559H), Elpelet (H0467I), Nogah (H5052) and Jerimoth (H3406N); also called Elishama at 1Ch.3.6;
Another name of e.li.shu.a (אֱלִישׁוּעַ "Elishua" H0474)
§ Elishama = "my God has heard"
1) an Ephraimite chief in the wilderness
2) a son of David
3) Jehoiakim's secretary
4) a priest who taught the law
5) a man of Judah
